title: Sunday's Area Scores-October 4
text: Sunday's Area Scores-October 4 - WGEM.com: Quincy News, Weather, Sports, and Radio Member Center: Latest Illinois sports Daniel Norris pitched one-hit ball for five innings and Tyler Collins had a bases-clearing triple as the Detroit Tigers finished their first-to-worst tumble in the AL Central with a 6-0 win over the Chicago White... More >> Cubs beat Brewers 3-1, await fate on hosting NL wild card The Chicago Cubs beat the Milwaukee Brewers 3-1 on Sunday for their eighth straight win, but still needed Pittsburgh to lose in order to host the Pirates in the NL wild-card game.
